Description:
4 BEDROOMS - QUIET LOCATION
Located in a very quiet court, midway between Lake Weeroona and the Botanical Gardens, this 4 bedroom weatherboard residence is a surprise package. Well maintained over the years, the home with a hardwood timber floor has a spacious lounge, with gas heating, a/c and cf which leads to the open plan meals and kitchen- there is plenty of storage and bench space here too.
The bedrooms are a generous size and the main has BIRs. Just right as is, this property could suit an investor or a first home buyer, and with a bit of imagination and cosmetic decorative flair, this home could be a stunner. View by appointment only, call to arrange your inspection today.
Darryn O'Keefe : 0418 509 563

Description:
NEAT AS A PIN!
Located in a quite, well established area of White Hills, this immaculately presented 2 bedroom brick veneer residence offers 2 bedrooms including walk in robe and built in robes.
Large lounge with gas heating, renovated kitchen with gas and electric appliances adjoining dining area, 3 piece bathroom, paved outdoor entertaining area and a double lock up garage.
Positioned on its own title, will suit retirees, investors and first home buyers.

Description:
PERIOD CHARMER - GARDENERS DELIGHT
Beautifully presented with a character all of its own, this 3 bedroom plus study or 4th bedroom weatherboard home is sure to impress. Superb solid timber kitchen with stainless steel appliances. large open plan dining, living space, 2 bathrooms, ducted heating & 3 split systems plus ceiling fans. Outside comprises carport, garage with workshop, 2 covered entertaining areas & spa, all set in a delightful established low maintenance garden area.

Description:
DESIGNED FOR ENTERTAINING
This quality master built family home is complete with all the modern conveniences you need in living and entertaining.
Comprising 5 bedrooms all with BIR's (master with full ensuite & WIR). Formal entry hall complete with square set cornice that runs thru ought the entire living zones, separate lounge/ cinema room,
large open plan light filled kitchen /meals/living area. The kitchen is complimented with breakfast bench along with S/S appliances, Cesar stone bench tops, and a three door pantry, storage like you would not believe 4 door linen.
As soon as you steep outside you will be greeted with a 16 x 4 meter outdoor alfresco area accommodating for all seasons, a fully lined 6 x 10 meter workshop complete with heating and cooling, beautiful low maintenance manicured gardens and rear gate access for trailers or caravans.
This property has so many extras the list could go on and on ducted gas heating, ducted refrigerated cooling, ducted vacuum, 9ft ceilings, porcelain tiles just to name a few.
Within walking distance to a primary school, public transport, botanical gardens, walking track to Lake Weeroona
and the White Hills shopping strip makes this property a must see. Inspection by appointment only!
Cameron Tweed : 0400 869 698

Description:
Best By Far in Bendigo - 4 Bedrooms, 3 Living Areas + Pool
Located in the prestigious “Peppercorn Estate”, this family sized home will impress.
Offering four bedrooms, ensuite & WIR to main, BIRs to all other bedrooms.
A variety of living areas, three in total will give every family member their own little prized area within the home.
Open plan living incorporates the “A” class kitchen with 900mm gas stove, dishwasher, heaps of storage and granite bench tops.
Ducted heating/cooling throughout, huge laundry and 3 piece tiled bathroom.
Internal access from the double garage, landscaped front gardens with side vehicle access through to the backyard, which is ready for your own personal touch to complete and also an inground salt chlorinated pool.
Walk to Lake Weeroona, new hospital precinct and Bendigo central.
Motivated vendors looking for genuine buyers.
Nekti Tzouroutis : 0412 242 321

Description:
Great Value in White Hills- 4 Bedrooms
Located directly across from the Botanical Gardens, this 4 bedroom (one located upstairs) brick veneer home offers both a great location and outstanding value to investors or owner occupiers.
All four bedrooms have impressive robes and are very spacious.
As an added bonus, there is a perfect study area adjoining one of the bedrooms.
A fully renovated kitchen offers plenty of cupboard space, breakfast bar and new appliances including DW. The open plan kitchen, dining and living area has new flooring, and the large windows at the front offer fantastic light and a lovely outlook.
On offer outside is a 2 car carport, large outdoor decking area perfect for alfresco entertaining and a 6m x 7m shed with concrete and power.
With fantastic updates throughout, an abundance of storage, 4 bedrooms + study, shedding, outdoor area, carport and close to parks, schools and White Hills amenities, this property is arguably the best value in the area.
Amanda Ellis : 0407 105 283

Description:
Superb 3 Bedroom Home in White Hills
Sale by Set Date 11/9/2012
This wonderfully presented, 3 bedroom property is the perfect place to settle a family. With its low maintenance and secure yard, ample storage and great undercover entertainment area opening out from the large lounge, this is the ideal place to call 'home'. Featuring a double carport, ensuite, gas hot water and heating, gas cooking and evaporative cooling, this property not only offers all the mod cons but also economy and efficiency. Located close to the exquisite White Hills Botanical Gardens and central to shops and schools, this wonderful home is everything you're looking for!

Description:
Walk to the lake!
First home buyers, retirees and investors would be wise to check out this extremely neat hardiplank home situated in a quiet street just a 5 minute drive to the Bendigo CBD and a short walk to Lake Weerona. Featuring three bedrooms, multipurpose study/home office and three garden sheds (all with concrete floor and two with power) the property presents a terrific opportunity for first home buyers looking to enter the market and for investors looking to add to their portfolios. The double carport and beautiful established gardens complete the picture. Call now to arrange an inspection as this property will not last long!

Description:
Take your dream home to new heights!
Sale by Set Date 26/6/2012
Situated in a highly sought after 'pocket' of White Hills is this quality built, contemporary family home. Entertaining is a breeze with the lounge/family room featuring bi-fold doors leading to a multi-purpose second living/rumpus room. From this area you can step onto an undercover decking area that provides further living space. During Summer, you can open this entire wing of the house to create an entertainment complex to relax with family and friends. Features include main bedroom with ensuite and walk-in-robe, practical modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, direct entry access from the double garage and high quality fixtures and fittings throughout plus many more! Inspection will truly impress!

Description:
2BRM Townhouse on Own Separate Title
Very well presented and representing affordable value, and so close to all of White Hills amenities & shops is this fantastic 2 Bedroom townhouse on its own title. With open carpeted lounge, separate kitchen/meals with slider to rear yard.
Kitchen with GHP, rangehood, electric oven, heaps of storage & benches.
Both bedrooms are of a substantial size with BIR's. There's a 3 piece bathroom, separate toilet and laundry.
Outside, single lock up garage with remote, established front & rear low maintenance yard, and back undercover verandah.
The front townhouse of two, it's just minutes to the CBD & Lake Weeroona.
Exceptional Value.

Description:
All the Charm of Yesteryear
This Classic period style home offers a glimpse of the charm of yesteryear with some modern features for comfort.
Offering 3 bedrooms, the front 2 bedrooms being substantial in size with open fire places, over mantles and ornate cornices & ceilings.
There's a 4 piece bathroom, ducted gas heating, updated kitchen and comfortable rear lounge/dining with open fire place and French doors opening onto the low maintenance rear yard.
Outdoors finds a separate studio and side street access to the carport.
This home is located on a private 650sqm block close to schools & public transport.

Description:
Renovated 4 Bedroom Beauty!
The young couple who own this home have lovingly renovated it. Now all the work has been done some lucky buyer will be able to move in and enjoy the results. The house has been repainted inside and out, new wiring, new kitchen and bathroom. The rich burgundy carpet throughout the house adds that extra touch of comfort and luxury. The location is the other attractive aspect of this house. Just a block away from Weeroona College, the walking track along the creek and close to the swimming pool, this is an incredibly handy position. The family cook will also be delighted by the convenience of the new kitchen. With its high quality, wooden cabinetry, brand new Westinghouse oven, stove top and double, stainless steel sink, cooking will be a pleasure. The kitchen also opens onto the living room which has an overhead fan, air conditioning and a cosy gas heater for the coming winter months. The high ceilings, the storage space in the laundry and quality curtains throughout are other features which make this house special. The well cared for garden has a great lawn at the back for the kids and built up garden beds. And Dad (or Mum) will love the large shed, which is not only powered and has a concrete floor but also boasts benches, shelves and a pot belly stove. You may want to move in yourself or rent this one. The house is not far from the hospital and given the influx of workers who will be building the new hospital this house could make a fantastic, low-maintenance rental property or perfect investment.

Description:
Surround Yourself With Style
Designed for entertaining and relaxed family living and all set in the fabulous Peppercorn Estate with its lovely outlook and wonderful walking tracks at your door step. This 7 y.o 4 bedroom family home features an impressive free flowing floor plan with generous sized proportions. The home incorporates open plan fully appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances, meals area and family living plus separate lounge. The spacious main bedroom has a three piece ensuite plus walk in robe. A beautiful family bathroom services the remaining 3 bedrooms all of which have built in robes. Other features include gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling; granite overlay bench tops and remote double garage with internal access. Outdoors has been delightfully landscaped which is serviced by a 3300 litre sub terrane irrigation system and has the addition of a comfortable eating area complete with timber decking and verandah.
Jenny Donaldson : 0409 484 391

Description:
Prime Location White Hills
Located in a quiet street overlooking the Botanical Gardens and close to shops, schools and sporting facilities this weatherboard Victorian style home is a real gem.
The home features high ceilings, dado boards, polished floorboards and ducted heating and cooling throughout.
Accommodation comprises 4 Bedrooms, 2 Bathrooms, well appointed Kitchen and spacious Living areas.
Outside improvements include double carport, garden shed, workshop and outdoor entertaining area.
This is a great property in a great location with the benefits of a pool, gardens and playgrounds right at your doorstep.
Leonie Butler : 0417 521 661
